author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Bathroom wall sconce tips…Easy project but there are important tips. I strip 1/2 inch to 5/8 inch of insulation from the copper wires. Then I install the bracket and ensure it’s level (otherwise the light won’t be level). I extend stranded wire about 1/8 inch beyond the copper wire and use wire nuts for solid connections. Then I connect the light to the bracket with the small screws provided. Btw, I recommend Milwaukee’s Precision Screwdriver Set for lights and thermostats. For more written bathroom tutorials and full step by step videos visit https://homerepairtutor.com🔥#wallsconce #bathroomremodel #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Bathroom Wall Sconce Tips - #shorts #electrical #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor
